system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Any
Scrutiny +10
Apt: Perception, Knowledge
system.descriptionText: Character designates one target in line of sight whilst their Servitor Comrade is in Cohesion, until the beginning of the Character's next turn, target has -20 to Dodge and Parry Tests to evade the character's Attacks, and Character gians +20 to dodge and Parry Tests to avoid the target's attacks.
